trends: There have been no other sightings in Ghent
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Low flying object heading west. It was very bright with no noise.
divs: Sighting DetailsGoing home from work at 3:30am and seen a low flying light north of me. it was the forth time I seen the object in a week. This time it was closer to me then the other times. So I pulled off the road and got out of my car. I started watching the object. Then the power lines next me started to make a very loud noise. I got scare the hair on my body was standing on end. got back in my car and drove off. 1. Ghent mn going home from work 2. Could not miss it. 3. Big plane. 4. Bright light moving fast. 5. Scared lots of energy in the air. 6. I did want to stay there any longer and drove off.
